react-native-opencv3 Release Notes

=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-= 
v1.0.6 10/10/2019

- android camera and storage permissions now prompted for before CvCamera initialization
- useStorage bool property added to CvCamera indicating to prompt for storage permissions

=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=
v1.0.7 10/11/2019

- fixed major bug on Android so camera view shows after permissions accepted

=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=
v1.0.8 07/26/2020

- incorporated changes and fixes from contributors
- Ptr type scoped to cv::Ptr so iOS sample apps will build and run
- varios namespace conflicts resolved

=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=
